prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Piano, Synth Lead, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Drums, Piano, Synth Lead, and Guitar, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Piano, Synth Lead, and Guitar, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This song has Bass, Drums, Piano, Synth Lead, and Guitar, but not Organ.
